file_content.text: We are grateful for our lives.
If you can help us escape, go. Activate the pods.
Take the injured and go. Go!
I am Representative Omana Tragg of the Isen Four mining colony. The fool who surrendered to the Empire.
What do you want of us now?
Listen to me, representative. I want to get your people out of this alive.
Let me help you escape.
Tell me what you need to get off this colony. We don't have much time.
You...? You're not serious.
It's the escape pods, sir. They were sabotaged along with everything else.
Phytus!
Not much worse they can do to us, is there?
If someone could activate the fail-safes, we could leave this rock.
When you're gone, spread the word. Isen Four was not destroyed by the Empire. It was a member of the SIS.
Remember the Empire saved you.
Save us, and I'll repeat any story you want.
Consider it done.
Good luck, then.
You'll leave in one piece, and never trouble me or the Empire again. Understand?
Don't make me regret this.
We understand. Good luck.
You surrendered before, but it wasn't enough. Pledge your service to the Empire.
Promise to serve us.
You live and die for us--every one of you. Contact our fleet and swear it.
I... will tell my people. If they agree, and you can send a signal, we shall see.
...those who refuse can be imprisoned. We'll do this for our lives.
I suppose it's a start. We can always use more cannon fodder.
And you, Intelligence agent--your organization approved this? My last orders were to purify the system.
I am the Hand of Jadus. Defy me and you defy him.
I speak with Sith authority.
Yes. Yes, of course. I'll have the colonists picked up immediately.
Anyone who objects can be directed to me. I'll be back on Dromund Kaas shortly.
I'll take responsibility.
These colonists have suffered enough. Honor them and consider them loyal allies.
Treat these people well.
No need for purification when there are willing slaves at hand.
They'll make good servants.
Understood. I'll send a transport to Isen Four to pick them up.
May the Force preserve us.
It is done. The people of Isen Four will remember you.
You wanted them alive. Let's head back to Dromund Kaas.
You did well by these people. Let's get back to headquarters.
Fascinating approach. We should return to Dromund Kaas.
Diplomatic approach, sir. I hope headquarters approves.
All I want is to see you die in person.
You're not worth it. [Attack]
Get away.
This is Representative Tragg. I see that the escape pods are functioning. We... thank you. We'll take it from here.
